comment: Professor McCormick is an absolute gem! Her classes are a breeze, with easy exams and helpful ALEKS homework. Unstuck ai has been a game-changer for staying on top of the material. Highly recommend this class, regardless of your math skills!

If you're good at math, its easy. If you're bad at math, its still easy. This class reminded me much of high school algebra. HW was on aleks, but she never made you do the knowledge check and she gave you unlimited attempts on each homework question. Exams just like the HW as she will provide a study guide through the HW software aleks. Must take!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor McCormick is a different breed! She helps you through everything and is so understanding. I aspire to be just like her in every sense of life.
Easily the best professor at Kennesaw State University!!
This woman is a saint and is so good at her job. She is truly one of the best math teachers I have ever had. Her patience and ability to explain the material makes her class enjoyable.

Very understanding professor. One of the best at KSU. If you struggle in math, she is amazing at teaching it in a very comprehensive way. I really enjoyed this class and while it was an earlier class, I never wanted to miss it because she was such a joy and her classes were very beneficial. I highly recommend her.
she is super nice and would take time to explain if you have any question. Exam are easy, just do the practice test.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I would take Mrs. McCormick a million times if I could. Her class was one of the easiest math classes I have ever taken. She has notes that she would post on D2L if you happened to miss class & she's always thorough. Attendance is a small percentage of your grade and there is weekly ALEKS homework. A few quizzes and tests, but nothing too hard.

She is amazing, I had an emergency and she took care of me. She's a great professor and is super nice. She is great. The class is not the easiest, but it's a lot easier with her. Make sure to do ALEKS!
Good teacher, very hands on and wants her students to succeed. Attendance is mandatory and part of the grade. Show up to class and so your homework and you will do solid in her class.

LOVED Professor McCormick! Her lectures are super clear and easy to follow. She always makes sure everyone is on the same page before continuing. Homework is on Aleks and due once a week. If you ever have the opportunity to take her, I cannot recommend her enough!

She is by far the sweetest professor I've ever had! She is so caring and wants everyone to understand the problems and offers so much help if needed! Math has always been a struggle for me but the way she teaches helps me understand it better. I highly recommend you take her class, she is awesome!!! I would rate her higher than a 5 if I could!

Professor McCormick is so kind and helpful, her lectures are helpful she doesn't go off a ppt she shows you how and gives examples, she's a likable teacher and grades fairly. You have homework due each Tuesday that can be up to 37 or fewer questions, you have 3 exams and 1 final and then quizzes but she provides study guides & review day. Take her!

McCormick was truly an amazing teacher, who was knowledgeable and her teaching style is simplistic.   Attendance is encouraged to understand the material and complete classwork, instead of later. She's accessible outside of class, especially office hours. Enthusiastic about subject & success. I would definitely take her again and highly recommend!

She provided the information needed to pass the tests in a way that made sense. If you didn't understand something covered she would be welcome to answer your question(s). She treats her students like adults. She would understand if you were not able to complete an assignment or make it to a test.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Professor McCormick is truly the best Mathematics Professor at Kennesaw State University. She has office hours every day of the week (M-F) and before exams will allow you to schedule Zoom appointments to help you cover the material. Extra credit is offered just by showing up to class. Lectures are engaging and classes are clearly planned out well.
I literally suck at math yet I believe that I will end with an A, clear teaching style, and very understanding.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Best teacher I have had at ksu. I was a dual-enrollment student and took her for Algebra. She posts all videos online on D2L, so if you miss a class you can complete classwork by doing that. Tests are easy as long as you do the work. Alecks hw every week.
If you dont get an A in this class you just dont care.

She is such a loving teacher and just wants the best for you. Aleks isn’t all she focus’ on and the more you participate in class the better you will do. I took pre calc at my highschool before her and she explains everything better than i’ve ever heard!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Easy A. The only way you fail is by not caring. Typically 4 test and final. You have a participation grade for every class. Homework due every Thursday.
This class is easy if you pay attention to your homework, the videos or lectures in the class, and go to the learning lab if you are struggling.

Going to class is not mandatory, but I recommend it because you are graded a class work participation which is a easy 100. The homework and test are easy, if you pay attention in class or to her YouTube lecture video's. I finish the class with a 98!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: McCormick is an amazing teacher who teaches the material in an easy to understand way. She grades only the tests, class work, homework, and the final. Participation matters and contributes to your class work grade so make sure to do the work.

McCormick makes learning easy. The test questions are very similar to the homework, so if you do the homework and understand it, you should have no trouble passing. I highly recommend attending class because McCormick explains topics in an easy-to-understand way that you couldn't get from a textbook or homework. I recommend taking her class.
Take her, you won't regret your decision!!

There's a lot of homework in this class, but professor McCormick is pretty reasonable and curves it. Come to class! There's an attendance grade every day which definitely helped offset some of my lower test grades. I put in a lot of work, but not more than my other classes.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: SHE'S A GOOD PRE-CAL PROFESSOR, trust me you won't regret your decision!!
She was very helpful throughout the whole semester. Very understanding and always willing to help everyone, wants people to understand and do good.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: I really enjoyed this class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Without question the best professor at KSU and the best professor I've ever had in my life. Outstanding Professor who encourages you to ask questions if you are ever confused about something.
She is an amazing professor who's helpful, but you really have to work hard to make sure you have a good grade.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Dr. McCormick is one of the best professors Ive had at KSU. Ive never been good at math but I almost pass the class with a 99.47%.
Professor McCormick is GREAT!! Her class is very easy and the math is actually understandable. There is homework 3 days a week, weekly Aleks HW, 2 quizzes per unit, and 4 exams.
These reviews do not lie!!! Great Professor. She is so caring and offered me help whenever I needed it. Take her you wont regret it :)
Prof. McCormick is hands down best math teachers Ive ever had. I got a 94 on my final exam and finished the class with a A.
Take this course if you want to learn by good professor!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. McCormick's videos are very helpful and easy to understand. She will help you prepare for the test and do one on one session if you are struggling with the subject. I made any A her class and made a 94 on the final exam because she helped when I was struggling.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. McCormick, is the best professor that I have come across at Kennesaw State. She truly cares about her students and tells you that every class. You won't regret your decision. TAKE HER !!!!!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: McCormick may have been one of the best math teachers Ive had! TAKE HER. If you struggle with math her office hours help a ton and sometimes you get one on one sessions for help. She has additional lectures on YouTube. Most of the work was through ALEKS and a few homework assignments but not overwhelming. Overall very caring and easy to pass!

Prof. McCormick is hands down best math teachers Ive ever had. I would recommend showing up to class because it makes it really easy. However, because of COVID you can just watch lecture videos at home and submit a worksheet to get credit for attending. She really cares and wants to help you do well. 10/10 would take again

She does not require you to come to class, but it helps. Also you do get credit so it does matter. She is very nice and a very good teacher. She is very understanding as I was dealing with a situation and she was very open to listening and helping. She does have homework due every week, but it is stated clearly and reminded. Would definitely recom.
Shes just the best Math professor at KSU in my opinion!!
There's a reason why Professor McCormick has basically a perfect rating, this Professor is an amazing person and loves to teach. I loved her lectures, you can't go wrong with Professor McCormick!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: She is an awesome professor to take.
Save yourself some time and do take her.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor McCormick is GREAT!! Her class is very easy and the math is actually understandable. There is homework 3 days a week, weekly Aleks HW, 2 quizzes per unit, and 4 exams. If you have a 94 you get to exempt the Final. She has office hours that are very beneficial. She is super friendly. A solid choice!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She makes video tutorials on how to solve problems on the hw that make it so much easier. She provides good feedback on questions you got wrong on the test/quiz. 10/10 would recommend.
In my opinion, She's the best Math professor at Kennesaw State!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: She creates videos for you to watch if needed. Her videos are very helpful and easy to understand. We used Aleks which is sometimes stressing but she helped out so much by letting us skip units on there. She gives out quizzes that are on lockdown browser and you cannot use your notes. Her test are take home and you can use your notes on them.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Take her she is super easy!!

She is an awesome professor to take. Very kind, cares about her students, and is always so responsive. She has set up the class in a way that keeps you on track and the workload is manageable. She is one of the best math teachers Ive ever had! Definitely take her class if you can! Easily one of the best professors Ive ever had! Loved her!!

Caroline Is one of the best professors Ive had at KSU. She really cares about her students & is extremely helpful in office hours. Ive never been good at math but I passed with class with a near 100 because of how thorough she is with her teaching. If you stay on track with homework you will pass.

The class itself is not too bad if you pay attention and this is coming from someone whose weakest subject is in math. Professor McCormick however is very picky about how to have your webcam set up for her lockdown browser quizzes. The course is very quiz and work heavy with exams for each unit and a final exam.

She was a good professor for online precalc. There was homework twice a week and a quiz around every other week, and they were usually very similar to practice quizzes. We did have very long ALEKS assignments that people struggled with, usually every week, but I think she had to assign it to us. Anyways take her!

Definitely recommend her class!! Especially for online.  She actively communicates with students and tutoring/ office hours help a lot. Shes super nice. Extra credit and points are given here and there. She makes everything clear in her videos which are a must. Not much work at all. Passing was super easy and math is my least strongest subject.
She is super easy and nice. Her videos are no more than 20 minutes long because they are straight to the point. I definitely recommend her!
SHE'S A GOOD ALGEBRA TEACHER, i'm NOT REALLY GOOD AT MATH AND I RECEIVED AN A TAKE HER!!!

Absolutely spectacular! The online class is very well organized, she gives a very reasonable amount of work, her online lectures on math topics can help you grasp the material in just a couple of minutes (or even seconds!). Tutoring helped a lot and the tests are very fair! This class is near perfect for online!

She is INCREDIBLE! TAKE HER CLASS!! If you struggle with math, her lectures are always easy to follow and she is SO good at explaining things. There is quite a bit of homework, but she is very lenient and her grading scale is perfect so that if you miss a few assignments, you don't automatically fail or have to make perfect test grades to pass.

Best math teacher I've ever been taught by. She is very good at instruction, gets to the point without messing around, and knows how to explain things simply. Wish I could take another class with her, I went from nearly failing math every semester to almost getting an A.

She was very helpful and supportive throughout the semester. Even though the class was hard for me since I'm not very good at math, she really helped me understand all the concepts at anytime, even when office hours weren't going on. Classes were online, but she always had time slots so we could seek help or just work on assignments with company.

Super nice. We transitioned to online halfway through the semester and she did a great job of adapting to the changes. She's been the best math teacher I've ever had. Math has never been my strength, and she made it feel like it was so easy. Always willing to talk one on one if you need to.
Shes one of the best Professors that I ever had Kennesaw State University!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Easily the best math class i have ever taken. she is very accessible outside of class, helps when you need it, and genuinely cares about her students, and it shows! homework is not just busy work and genuinely helps you on the test! you will have an ALEKS test and take home test for each unit, but overall very easy!!

We had to be online this semester because of covid but she made it so easy to follow along and learn the material. She filmed her own "lecture" vids that were easy to understand. She emails back quick and is available to help you out. would recommend!

She is so sweet! She is a teacher who truly does want you to succeed. She gives you plenty of extra credit opportunities throughout the semester. She drops your lowest test grade & replaces it with the final. ALEK homework is due weekly & is 15% of your grade but if you get it done, it's an easy A. Classwork is easy & she explains topics very well
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I had Ms. McCormick for fall 2020, so it was online. She did a phenomenal job. Her video recordings were spot on and easy to understand. Whenever I emailed her, she responded very quickly and was super nice. The test reviews prepare you for tests very well. I would recommend her to anyone.

She is very caring and very, very helpful. I couldn't have picked a better professor. It was a very easy class although the online ALEKS page can get frustrating at times. Other than that, classwork is very easy along with the tests. She is very responsive when emailed and also thorough. She is the best professor that I could have picked.

Be prepared for 15-19 homework assignments and a few other classwork assignments during the week. Online she posts videos to do the classwork but you're essentially teaching yourself math concepts. Start your homework on the weekends so you wont have to worry about them or you WILL get overwhelmed. Lockdown browser used for tests.

Really good professor. I was skeptical at first because I did not want to take math online, but she made it very easy to work. Homework was done weekly on ALEKS, and virtual hours if you have any questions. She also emails back pretty fast. Provides feedback on every assignment too!
Nothing needed to be said

I took her during the beginning of COVID-19. She is a great teacher, she is really good at simplifying the math! She doesn't make the terminology super difficult. You have to do homework but its all good practice for the test. The test are very straight forward, she does not try to trick you! If you have a chance to take her, I would!
Take her!!!! She is very helpful in class or after class. She is nice and the made the class really easy.

Best math teacher ive had so far. We had 4 tests and the final replaced your lowest test grade. Homework was on Aleks and we had in class assignments. She is very scatter brained but everything taught was cohesive. Take advantage of SI sessions and Office Hours.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: She is an amazing professor!! Her grading is very clear, she is available outside class to answer questions, and she makes sure you know the material well. Study guides, in-class lectures, and ALEKS homework make the tests very straightforward. She takes homework grades every class period, which is calculated as an attendance grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor McCormick is wonderful. She's great at responding to emails, explaining the material, and helping. We had homework due every week online, classwork, and 4 exams plus a final. Overall, her class isn't difficult if you really pay attention and follow along with her. She takes attendance but it technically isn't for a grade.

Best math professor for sure! Shes super sweet, caring, and wants the best for her students. Her lectures are easy to follow. She usually takes up a classwork grade, which is just practice from what you just learned. Homework is on ALEKS but not bad at all. If you can, take her!! Shell make sure you pass!
Prof McCormick is so sweet and really knows her stuff! She is always ready to help in any way she can. She makes learning math, of any kind, way easier. I definitely recommend her!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: She is a nice teacher and she will actually help you learn even if you have no prior knowledge of the subject. Attendance is required but even just sitting in class hear he lecture you will learn most of the material. She prepares you for every exam well. TRUST ME TAKE HER. It is worth switch up your schedule for her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: This is my second time taking one of professor McCormick's classes, she is an amazing professor who is very clear in her instructions and what she expects you to know for the tests. She teaches math so that anybody can understand it. She is super sweet and caring and is willing to help you outside of class if you need it. Take her!

WOW I LOVED THIS CLASS. Professor McCormick is by far one of the best professors at KSU. She responds to emails within minutes, cares about her students & their futures, and as long as you care and put the effort in the class is fun. Change your schedule for her classes!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: When I say this is the beat math class I've taken in my college career, I mean it! Amazing professor! She's very passionate about the subject and she teaches it in a way where it's easy to understand. I've never been hood at math but in her class, I know I'll atleast pass with an A if not a B. She's awesome and I would definitely recommend her!

TAKE HER! She is so down to earth and cares about her students. She explains the material so well and makes sure you understand. I feel so confident in math because of her and her class. She could not make this class any easier! Show up and you will end the semester with an A. There is a learning assistant if needed. Bottom line, take her!!!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Best math teacher ever!!!!! Easiest class ever!!!! She is so good at explaining material and making sure youre prepared for tests. I would definitely recommend professor mccormick!!!!
The best math teacher i have ever had. She learned everyone's name too which was crazy. She was so patient with questions i don't know how she did it. There were kids that asked some bad questions.

Attendance is sometimes mandatory. Class is super easy because Prof. McCormick is an amazing professor. Primarily teaches by giving a bunch of examples Last half of class is spent doing classwork that if you finish early you can leave early. My class ended at around 12:15 but I usually left by 11:50ish

Professor McCormick is a great professor!! Her college algebra class is so easy. If you show up to class, take notes, do the homework, then you'll ace the tests and quizzes. She's a very kind and loving professor who wants all her students to pass. My grade was so high that she let me exempt the final. Amazing professor!

I took Professor McCormick for Algebra and now I am taking Trig with her. She is great at teaching math, realistic with the workload and very pleasant. I would not recommend skipping her class because attendance is taken through classwork and is a large % of your grade. We now use Aleks for homework, which is time consuming but helpful on the tests

She was one of the best professors I ever had. All the material she teaches, she teaches it so well. I was never confused in this class and if I ever was she made sure to go over the material until the majority of the class understood it. I would 100% recommend taking Professor McCormick.

If you are not the best at math, she is a great professor for you. She teaches by showing you many ex's and goes through each type of problem. You have a lesson each day and then class work,counts as attendance which is usually easy if you pay attention and you almost always get to leave early. 4 test, 4 My Math Lab HW's, & 4 quizzes. I LOVED HER!

Great professor; I highly recommend her. Very understanding, flexible, and super laid back. Taught very clearly and was willing to explain things and give examples until everyone understood. Made the class as easy and stress-free as possible. Always did notes first, then allowed students to leave class early if they finished their classwork early.

Prof. McCormick is awesome!! Explains concepts thoroughly and clearly, really personable, suuuuper chill. 4 semester tests and a final, test questions are super similar to homework/study guide questions. The notes she does in class are helpful for reviewing as well, and she posts everything on d2l. Would absolutely take her again.

Mrs. McCormick is such a good teacher. The class was very easy if you come to class and do your homework. Take home quizzes, 4 tests (& additional cumulative final), and homework make up your grade. There is a lot of graded classwork, so is heavily needed. Before the test we had a review day & she would prepare a practice test. No surprises.

Professor McCormick is really sweet and a good teacher. I found this class super easy but apparently there were some kids in my class struggling. She really makes sure everyone knows whats going on. As long as you go to class and do the homework, you should be able to make an A. She also makes really good test reviews.

Ms. McCormick is seriously an amazing professor. I've always struggled with math, but she made it seem so easy for me. She's extremely helpful and teaches super well - she truly does wants to help you. Her homework is easy, the workload is relatively light, and the tests are no problem if you study. Definitely take her!!!!!

By far the best math teacher I have ever had. It isn't an easy A class but she is willing to help you with anything you don't understand and is really good with giving examples. She explains concepts really well. The homework does have a lot of questions but it is very doable. She also gives take home quizzes. Do the classwork! It's not hard.

Just an overall solid teacher, not strict, not aggressive, and she is super clear on everything she expects. She is a fantastic teacher, and provides the clearest examples, I struggled with trig in high school and she helped me blow right through it like the class was a joke. Take her at all cost.
Great Professor. Very kindhearted, had her in high school math and just so happened to see her again in college. Happy to help and provides clear examples for every new topic.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: one of the nicest teachers I've ever had. She will work with you after or before class to make sure you understand the topic. All the notes are on d2l and you can basically teach yourself all the material if you'd prefer. Homework is very long but its not due until the day of the test and it helps a lot. She gives take home quizzes frequently.

rearrange everything to take her if you arent good at math. I understood NOTHING in high school and actually understood what she was teaching each day. you have to do the HW but its around 65 questions and you have 2 weeks to do it before the next test. if she has a student teacher in the class use them!! *makes it super easy and understanding*

If you have to rearrange your entire schedule to be able to take her, do it. I'm not great at math but she made it a breeze. She works fast & you will need to do the homework, but she let's students ask questions. I left each day actually understanding the material. She will work with you and let you know exactly what will be on the test. Bless her

Probably the most angelic professor I've ever had. She is very good at covering all the points of her lessons and gives extra credit for attendance. If you take Math 1112, do yourself a favor and take her class.

Great professor for anyone who struggles with math. Super sweet and cares about her students. Makes an intimidating class a breeze. I would take her for every math class if I could. Mymathlab was straightforward and helpful. She gives extra credit for every exam. Easy A if you keep up and go to class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Shes a very good teacher and goes into detail! Easy class

Mrs. McCormick is the best math professor I've ever taken! I really wish I could have her again for future math courses. She makes her class super easy and will bend over backwards to make sure you understand the material and succeed! She gives extra credit through attendance and mini pop quizzes, and you get a 100% for 80% completion on HW.

Mrs. McCormick is the sweetest person and genuinely cares about her students. She makes difficult material easy! If you come to class, you will do great on the exams! I would highly recommend taking her!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This professor is the sweetest professor I've ever had. She only gives homework before the test and all you have to get on it is an 80 and she'll put it in as a 100. You don't have to go to class, but she's really good at teaching the material and she gives extra credit pretty much every class. I technically got over a 100 in the class.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor McCormick is awesome you definitely need to take her if you have to take trig class is so easy and all the tests are so easy she goes over every step for every problem over and over.

Best math professor I've ever had. If i could take her for all my math courses I would. She explains thoroughly and makes sure every students gets the material before moving on. May give out a problem at the end of class that will count for extra credit. Really nice and tests are just like problems worked before in class. Highly recommend!!!

I wish I could take her for my future math courses! She teaches the class as if you have had no experience with the topic, and always tells you what she wants you to be able to do on her tests. She has 7 planned quizzes in the syllabus and drops your two lowest, and her tests are short and very easy. Do yourself a favor and take her

TAKE HER. Amazing teacher. Simplicifies the material soooo much. I love math and her class was a breeze. Even if you do dont, she gives plenty of examples and her tests are very similar to the examples she works out in class. Excellent teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: I love her! She's so nice and lenient, and teaches in a very understandable way. She offers extra credit at least once a week. If you need help, she is very open to it. You just need to go to class because she covers so much material every day. Definitely take her!
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--EXTRA CREDIT--Would take again

comment: I have always struggled in math and never made anything higher than a B in my math classes. However, in McCormicks class I made an A. She is such an amazing teacher, she's very understanding that we are all busy colleges students who are just trying to pass her class to graduate. She makes all exam exactly like the review and notes.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--EXTRA CREDIT--Would take again

comment: Professor McCormick is absolutely amazing. She is super prepared, organized, and gives plenty of examples to prepare you for quizzes and tests. She is caring and gives tons of extra credit.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT--Would take again

comment: She is super helpful and makes sure all of her students understand what she is teaching. There are five tests and quizzes, and then the final. If you take notes and do the homework, you should do okay.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Would take again

comment: Great teacher. Really helps you understand the material. Gives a lot of extra credit.

Professor McCormick is an amazing professor that really cares for her students. She is always prepared for the class and always explains the content very clearly. Attendance is not mandatory but she does give extra credit without announcing it during class sometimes. Take her if possible, you won't regret it.
Mrs. McCormick is an amazing math teacher! She explains everything clearly and gives plenty of examples. If you do bad in this class its because you dont care.

Professor McCormick is hands down, the best math teacher I've ever had. I took her Trigonometry class and rarely found myself lost in the content. She is very detailed in her lectures, handwrites all of the notes/examples on the board for you, is open to questions at any time, and is willing to help you out when needed. She also gives extra credit.

She's the best professor I've had so far. It's really hard to get confused in her class because she goes through examples step by step instead of having you figure it out yourself. She gives multiple examples of every type of question you will see on her quizzes, homework, and tests. People rarely have questions to ask because she covers everything

She is the best professor I've had. She really cares about her students and makes sure that nobody has any questions. Thoroughly explains each step of every problem. Lots of opportunity for extra credit. Attendance is not mandatory , but will randomly give extra credit just for showing up. She posts the keys to quizzes right after taking them.

One of the best! Easy to understand and has lots of examples. Tests don't have many questions, and aren't very difficult. Online homework is an easy A and bonus points given at the end of class are helpful. Wish I could take her for every math. Do yourself a favor and take her class while you can.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: One of the best professors I have ever taken. Very clear and for someone who has never been great in Math classes, I'm passing with a great grade already. Very personable and gives great lectures.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: She is such as sweet lady! I love her! She explains everything in detail which is great if math isn't your subject. She posts the notes and hw online. She drops the two lowest quiz grades and replaces a low test grade with the final. She does give extra credit for many opportunities. Very knowledgeable.  I would take her again!

Explains everything in detail and only covers topics that you will need in future classes. Gives tons of extra credit and truly cares about her students. Wish there were more professors like her!! A++++

Lots of extra credit, easy tests and quizzes as long as you pay attention in class or just look over the notes at home. Class is not mandatory but sometimes she gives extra credit just for coming. If you are not good at math TAKE HER! She is always available to help and she never makes you feel dumb for asking questions. She is SO sweet and caring.

Best math teacher I have ever had in my whole entire educational career. Everything she teaches is clear cut. She prepares us very well for exams and tells us EXACTLY what to expect. She gives tons on extra credit for just going to class. She also helps with cute little memorization hacks to help us get through trig. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!!!!!

Mrs. McCormick was a great teacher!! I have always hated college algebra and she made it so much easier to understand and focuses only on what we NEED to know. Very lenient on questions, gives you half credit if you attempt, and provides enough quizzes before the tests to test your knowledge of the material. Would take her again for sure!

Ms. McCormick is a such an easy professor. If you took Trig in high school you literally dont even have to show up to this class. She gives extra credit for just showing up to class and all her material is incredibly easy. She lectures in a way thats super easy to follow and she never makes you feel like your questions are dumb.

LOVED this professor. I find math kind of difficult, but she made trig fun and easy. She's so nice and sweet, and she will literally give you extra credit just for going to class. She gives 3 tests, a "quest", and 8 quizzes. She drops your lowest quiz grade. And she has review days before each test.  There's homework due every week too (easy).

Great Professor! makes learning math easy. Very outgoing and explains concepts well. Posts all of her notes online. There are a lot 8 quizzes, 5 tests, online homework and one final. Easy A if you pay attention. She works through a lot of examples in class and answers questions.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--TEST HEAVY

comment: My favorite teacher ever!!! She gives a lot of extra credit which you can get for just coming class. She drops your 3 lowest quiz grades. I enjoy coming to class! Would take again!!

The best math teacher for MATH1112 there is. The material is really easy and she basically waters down everything for you. Even if she didn't, I still think that the material is pretty easy. She also gives extra credit just because. There is not much homework and it's on mymathlab. I recommend taking her.

I have zero complaints about her or her class. She makes everything easy to understand and usually if you just show up to class she will give you extra credit. She always tells you exactly whats on the quizzes and test, and is more than willing to answer any questions. Make sure and check for the homework but even if you get a 70 she gives a 100.

She gives extra credit just for showing up, and she is very excited to be there. Posts all notes online, easy to follow both in class and on the computer. Tests are bi weekly and quizzes are weekly. She's cool
She gives extra credit! She puts lecture notes on D2L before class. Tests and quizzes were easy. Drops two quizzes and replaces your lowest test grade with the final. Take her if you want an easy A!

Professor McCormick is one of the best math professors I have had. She gives clear notes with many examples for each section, and will help anyone along the way. She also makes sure to give everyone feedback on every test and quiz for you to do better. She also gives extra credit just for you showing up to class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Take her for an easy A, homework is easy and online, her grading scale is pretty cool, you don't need the textbook access code is enough, she posts all her notes in case you missed class, quizzes and test are literally the same format as notes just different numbers, nice attitude and positive vibe, gives extra credit frequently

Best professor I ever had! Take her if you're OKAY in math. She makes sure her students understand, is willing to answer any questions, and provides help at any given moment. If you're taking Trig, I would recommend her.  You'll definitely pass. She gives a lot of homework but gives you a reasonable amount of time to complete.

Mrs. McCormick is definitely an amazing professor. She posts all the notes online and basically goes through them in class. Just print them off and go to class for reassurance. Her assignments are on mymathlab and you can spend 30 mins completing all her work for the next two weeks. She is really nice, and still new to the professor thing.

I  do not know how I would have done if I didn't show up every time there was class.    But to me, you want to get an A, then you have to work for it. If you need help she is there during her office hours and before class. If you make an attempt then she is more than willing to help you.  Math is my weakest subject and she helped me succeed.

She's awesome! Super nice and patient. She returns emails fast and makes it her goal to help you understand each lesson. She also gave us extra credit each time we showed up and every other class. Highly recommended by someone who sucks at math.

She is a great teacher for those of you that might not be great at math. I think she is new to KSU so that is probably why she doesn't have many ratings. The best thing about her class is the extra credit quizzes she gives. She also drops your lowest quiz grade as well as replaces your lowest test grade with your final.
